The OU community

Map (campus) and directions

Full information of all of the OU locations including headquarters and offices local to you.

NUS card

How the NUS extra card can help you to save money when buying from various outlets.

OU Students Association

All about The Open University Students Association (OUSA) and how to get involved.

Peer support

All of us here at Peer Support have lots of experience of the ups and downs of studying, and we know that it can sometimes feel like a struggle. We can't advise you on your academic study, but we do understand how it feels.

Safety when on placements or volunteering

If you take a work placement or volunteer, support is available if you have any concerns.

Student consultation

Become involved in the student consultation forum and help enhance the student experience for yourself and others.

Support and protection for younger students

Make sure you stay safe while you’re studying, plus links to helpful organisations.

The 2014 national student survey

Volunteer as a disability support assistant

How to register to become a Disability Support Assistant at a residential school.

Volunteer with the audio recording centre

All the information you need to volunteer for the Audio Recording Centre.
